backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining salon, booking, user profile, and image types with authorization and storage mixins plus initial Swiss salon seeding logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report enumerating V38 AppV1.jsx replacement, compilation fixes, and state‑safe deploy logic with associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text mapping many frontend file paths to short functional descriptions for build and planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions with OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global border/background rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wrapper component that simply renders and exports AppV1.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large React V38 UI containing client and pro components, presets, and interactive salon browsing and creation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating authenticated or anonymous backend actor and auto‑invalidating related queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state handling and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for query-related React hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalonImage.ts: Empty placeholder file for salon image handling hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for theming, and custom animations and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Empty placeholder page component for the client dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page component for the login screen.
frontend/src/pages/ProDashboardPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page component for the professional dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/SalonDetailsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page component for displaying salon details.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing aura text for a salon based on category, type, tags, and city.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Empty placeholder utility file for currency helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current architecture, reset history, planned UI/UX, dataset strategy, and known issues.
